PageTitle: Online PPTX to ODP converter | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Convert PPTX files to ODP online with a few clicks. Free and easy to use. No registration required.
LearnMoreText: Convert PPTX presentations into ODP files online. Simply drag and drop or upload your PPTX presentation and get the converted ODP file in seconds. Don't worry about the privacy of your data — all files you upload are reliably encrypted. Start editing your converted ODP files right in your browser. Create a free account and create and collaborate on stunning slides with customizable charts and tables. Make your ODP presentation more interactive with ready-made transitions and animations.
